name: Ludumdare #35
description:
It has begun!

Someone has summoned the Great Archdemon Beelzael.

No one can beat him, except for one person... YOU!

Take over the roll of a necromancer, gather bodyparts that alter your skills, to beat Beelzael!

WASD to move. Mouse for shooting and Tab for inventory. You can equip items faster by right clicking on a item slot

--Parallel Universe Studios--

Robert vater - Programmer, Pixeler, Genius

Julian Höning - Musician, Sounddesigner, Pixler
